content.en: Muscle force estimation: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to accurately evaluate muscle forces during human movement. These algorithms include static optimization and EMG-to-force processing, neuromusculoskeletal tracking, two-step EMG-and-optimization, physiological inverse approach, EMG-driven models, muscle synergy analyses, computational tools, task constraints and minimization of muscle effort, Calibrated EMG-Informed NMS Modelling Toolbox, consideration of femoral bending moments, simulation of EMG data, real-time musculoskeletal modeling driven by electromyograms, surface electromyography, EMG-marker tracking optimization, muscle force estimation with uncertainties, measured synergy excitations, optimization framework for muscle activation prediction, hybrid algorithms for muscle excitation patterns, recruitment criteria, musculotendon models, and muscle coordination strategies, moving horizon EMG-marker tracking algorithm, moving horizon estimation, and linear approaches for estimating end-point force using surface electromyography. These algorithms aim to improve rehabilitation, man-machine interfacing, and the accuracy of muscle force estimation during human gait.
content.da: Muskelkraftestimation: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for nøjagtigt at evaluere muskelkræfter under menneskelig bevægelse. Disse algoritmer inkluderer statisk optimering og EMG-til-kraft behandling, neuromuskuloskelet tracking, to-trins EMG-og-optimering, fysiologisk invers tilgang, EMG-drevne modeller, muskel-synergi analyser, beregningsværktøjer, opgavebegrænsninger og minimering af muskelindsats, kalibreret EMG-informeret NMS-modellering værktøjskasse, overvejelse af femorale bøjetræk, simulering af EMG-data, realtids muskulært skeletmodellering drevet af elektromyogrammer, overflade elektromyografi, EMG-markør tracking optimering, muskelkraftestimation med usikkerheder, målte synergi excitationer, optimeringsramme for forudsigelse af muskelaktivering, hybride algoritmer for muskelexcitation mønstre, rekrutteringskriterier, muskulotendine modeller og muskel koordinationsstrategier, bevægende horisont EMG-markør tracking algoritme, bevægende horisont estimering og lineære fremgangsmåder til estimering af endepunktskraft ved hjælp af overflade elektromyografi. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre rehabilitering, interface mellem menneske og maskine, og nøjagtigheden af muskelkraftestimation under menneskelig gang.
